item.title: Xbox Series price increase announced for U.S.
item.content:encoded:
• Xbox Series

Another price hike.

Microsoft will increase the price of Xbox Series consoles in the United States once again on October 3, following a global price increase that occurred back in May. It cites “changes in the macroeconomic environment” as its reason for the increase.

Xbox Series S consoles have increased by $20, while Xbox Series X and Xbox Series X Digital have increased by $50, and the Xbox Series X 2TB Galaxy Black by $70. Coupled with the May increase, Xbox Series consoles have increased in price up to $200.

Here are the new prices:
